# Welcome to my website!

:::{#hero-heading}
:::

I’m a PhD candidate in the Fisheries and Aquatic Sciences program at the University of Florida. My research focuses on seafood markets, sustainable consumption, and the nutritional impacts of seafood on consumers. My dissertation explores how incentives and product attributes influence consumer behavior in seafood markets.

--- 

You can find my research papers and ongoing projects [on this page](research/index.qmd)
